Function Documentation

template<typename T>
static void DebugInfo (  const string &  sClassName,
const string &  sFuncName,
const string &  sDebugType,
const T &  tInfo,
const string &  sFile,
const long &  lLine
)  [static]
 

Function to log debug data.

Data can be logged to either console if DEBUG_APP_CONSOLE is defined or to a XML log file if DEBUG_APP_LOG is defined.

Parameters:
sClassName Name of the class from which the function is called.
sFuncName Name of the function from which the function is called.
sDebugType The type of debug this is; information, error, warning etc..
tInfo The debug data.
sFile The physical path of the file from which the function is called.
lLine The line on which the function is called.
Remarks:
sFile and lLine can be defined using the shorthand macro FILE_INFO.
Example Usage:
    DebugInfo( "CMainClass", "SomeFunction", "Error", "An error occured because of something", FILE_INFO );
